name: CovidVency
description:
Context:

The Covid-19 virus is under attack by vaccines, help it protecting it with its crown!

Controls:

You can click the buttons with the Mouse 🖱 or tap with a TouchScreen 📱 and also Left and Right arrow keys ⬅➡ are available

Assets:

Kyrie Eleison by TimoVersemann

You're no good but I love you by Soft and Furious

Tabler Icons (Speaker Icons)

Share with your friends:
Credits:

Jose 'Yiro' - Direction & Game Design

Roberto L.P. - Art Direction

Elizabeth R.C. - SoundEffects, Music & Design

Jesus 'SmashPlays' - UI Design

Game developed during a Game Jam:

Game developed for ScoreSpace Jam #17

Theme: Protect

Available time to develop the game: 72 hours
